spider
Class AbstractTrackerScanner

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      spider.AbstractTrackerScanner
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BtJunkieScanner, ThePirateBayScanner, TorrentBitScanner
public abstract class AbstractTrackerScanner
extends java.lang.Thread

Handles the work that is common for all the spiders: connection to server, finding files in torrent and sending them to the server.

Author:
ivaylo

getFilesInTorrent

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getFilesInTorrent(java.lang.String link)
Gets the files at the specified location.

Parameters:
link - The location of the torrent which files is to be returned.
Returns:
A List of String containing the names of the files that are in the torrent. If some error occurs, null is returned.
